effect.sword_shield: For five turns (including this one), passive effects of held items are ignored, and Pokémon will not use their held items.

effect.legends_arceus: For five turns (including this one), passive effects of held items are ignored, and Pokémon will not use their held items.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon’s held items lose their effects for five turns.
